content:
/>
VII.i.4.B.2.d
.
Effect of Net Worth on Parental Dependency
If family income is within the income limits specified under
38 CFR 3.250
, net worth is not a factor.
If, however, the claimant reports substantial net worth, determine whether
the assets are the type that should be generating interest or dividends, and
all interest and dividends were reported.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B - Establishing Parental Dependency
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B
